Lyrics_Classifier package¶

Submodules¶

Lyrics_Classifier.Data_Scraping_func module¶

Lyrics_Classifier.Data_Scraping_func.collect_artist_song_pages(artist_link)[source]¶

Parses the collection of urls for each artist_st

Lyrics_Classifier.Data_Scraping_func.collect_song_urls(http_links)[source]¶

Parse each song url

Lyrics_Classifier.Data_Scraping_func.create_artist_directory(namelist)[source]¶

Converts the user input artist name to dash form / Creates artist folders in current path

Lyrics_Classifier.Data_Scraping_func.create_artist_url(st_name)[source]¶

Takes a list of names Generates base url pattern for each name Returns artist urls

Lyrics_Classifier.Data_Scraping_func.song_parsing(song_http)[source]¶

Collect artist name again from the url Parse the songs Omit the songs with non-pattern matching urls Write .txt files

Lyrics_Classifier.Songs2DF_func module¶

Lyrics_Classifier.Songs2DF_func.merge_dataframes(namelist)[source]¶

Merges individual artist dataframes, drops na and removes junk

Lyrics_Classifier.Songs2DF_func.text_dataframe_csv(namelist, loc)[source]¶

Creates a dataframe per artist, cleans the text and saves as .csv
